entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Kincardine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 6:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -0.5°C
Wind: SW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Ice pellets at times mixed with snow changing to freezing drizzle this evening then to flurries at times heavy near midnight. Risk of snow squalls before morning. Local blowing snow before morning. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 then north 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 5:05 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:05 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 5:05 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
